channel.title: Maps on my trip navigation
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on my trip navigation

item.title: San Francisco
item.description: How to Get Around by Public Transportation SFMTA「Muni Service Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-service-map BART「Schedules」 https://www.bart.gov/sites/default/files/docs/BARTDetailedMapWeb.pdf SFMTA「Muni Metro Map」 https://www.sfmta.com/maps/muni-metro-map San Francisco Bay Ferry「Routes & Schedules」 https://sanfranciscobayferry.com/routes-and-schedules Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Tips Clipper Card: Clipper is the all-in-one transit card used for contactless fare payments throughout the San Francisco Bay Area. https://www.clippercard.com/ClipperWeb/ Clipper customers get discounts on one-way fares of 50 cents for adults, 25 cents for youth and 19 cents for senior and disabled riders.

item.title: Seattle
item.description: Our offline app for Seattle HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation The system maps include information on key destinations, landmarks and connecting services and transfer points in 5 areas of King County. All Schedule and Map could be found and download from here. https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps Northwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-nw Northeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-ne Central area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-central Southwest area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-sw Southeast area https://kingcounty.gov/en/-/media/king-county/depts/metro/maps/system/09022023/metro-system-map-se Kings County Metro https://kingcounty.gov/~/media/depts/metro/maps/seattle/09172022/pdf/downtown-seattle-frequency-geo-map.pdf RapidRide https://kingcounty.gov/en/dept/metro/routes-and-service/schedules-and-maps#rapidride-1 Sound Transit current service https://www.

item.title: Boston
item.description: Our offline app for Boston HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Trip planner https://www.mbta.com/ MBTA Bus Map https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/2023-03/2023-3-13-system-map.pdf MBTA Subway https://www.mbta.com/schedules/subway Map https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/2022-12/2022-12-12-subway-map-v37f.pdf MBTA Commuter Rail Map https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/2023-01/2023-01-23-commuter-rail-map.pdf MBTA Ferry Route Map https://cdn.mbta.com/sites/default/files/media/2022-09/2022-09-12-ferry-map.png BOSTON WATER TAXI「Our Stops」 https://www.bostonwatertaxi.com/interactive-stop-map Taxi, Uber, Lyft Uber https://play.google.com/store/search?q=uber&c=apps Lyft https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.lyft.android Bluebikes https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.motivateco.hubway Tips CharlieCard: CharlieCards are reusable cards that can be loaded with cash value or passes to pay bus and subway fares. CharlieCards are available at fare vending machines in most subway stations.

item.title: Zurich

item.title: Rome
item.description: Our offline app HERE Public transportation Find the route Use Google Map to find the route. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.maps&hl=en&gl=US Inside Rome, use metro and bus. https://www.atac.roma.it/utility/mappe Outside Rome or taxi Use Free Now or Uber. Free Now is much cheaper. Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=taxi.android.client iPhone: https://apps.apple.com/US/app/id357852748?mt=8 You can find FreeNow option in Google Map search below all other options. From/to airport Fiumicino Aeroporto Use fast train (RV/REG) by Trenitalia (8~14 Euro) or SIT Bus Shuttle (~7 Euro) or Free Now taxi (~50 Euro).

item.title: Mallorca
item.description: Our offline app for Mallorca HERE Public transport map https://www.tib.org/en/xarxa-de-transports/mapa-linies Bus lines and bus stops https://www.emtpalma.cat/en/bus-stops Palma de Mallorca Airport https://www.palmaairport.info/ Departures https://www.palmaairport.info/mallorca-airport-pmi-flight-departures-today/ Bus to and from airport https://www.palmaairport.info/public-transport/taking-the-bus-from-palma-airport/ Train link to Palma Airport https://www.palmaairport.info/public-transport/taking-the-train-in-mallorca/ Internet access at Palma Airport https://www.palmaairport.info/airport/airport-services-facilities/internet-wifi/ Shops and Stores at Palma Airport https://www.palmaairport.info/airport/shops-and-stores-at-palma-airport/ Places to eat and drink at Palma Airport https://www.palmaairport.info/airport/airport-services-facilities/places-to-eat-drink/ Mallorca foods/gourmet you must try Famous food top 5 Sobrasada: Sobrassada in Balearic or Sobrasada in Spanish, is a raw, cured sausage from the Balearic Islands made with ground pork, paprika, salt and other spices.

item.title: Moscow
item.description: Our offline app for Moscow HERE Metro map https://mosmetro.ru/metro-map/ https://transport.mos.ru/common/upload/docs/map/s.pdf Tram http://none.ru/files/mostram_map.pdf Bus https://static.urbica.co/projects/longread/img/magistral.pdf Airport https://www.svo.aero/en/main Russia foods you must try Famous foods top 5 Сельдь под шубой (Dressed herring): Dressed herring, colloquially known as herring under a fur coat, is a layered salad composed of diced pickled herring covered with layers of grated boiled eggs, vegetables, chopped onions, and mayonnaise. Some variations of this dish include a layer of fresh grated apple while some do not.

item.title: Oslo
item.description: Our offline app for Oslo HERE Public transport Ruter Provides tickets and schedules for all public transport within Oslo. Find trams (trikk), subways (T-bane), ferries (ferge), local trains (lokaltog) and busses (buss) on the website or in the Ruter app. You can also buy travelcards and tickets in some kiosks (Narvesen, 7-Eleven, Deli de Luca and Mix). Go to ruter.no Entur Entur finds journeys across all transport options in all cities in Norway.

item.title: Paris
item.description: Our offline app for Paris HERE Route Search Latest Maps for free Download Find your timetable Visiting Paris and its surrounding areas Everything you need to know to plan your visit to Paris and the Île-de-France region. Bonjour RATP app Preparing your trip to Paris: hours of operation Weekdays, the metro operates from 5:30 a.m. to about 1:15 a.m. On Friday and Saturday evenings, as well as on the eve of bank holidays, trains run until about 2:15 a.

item.title: Dubai
item.description: Our offline app for Dubai HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Metro: The Red Line (which has stations at or near most of the major tourist destinations and along The Sheikh Zayed Road), and The Green Line (which has stations along the residential part of the city). Red Line: Runs from Rashidiya to UAE Exchange. Green Line: Connects Etisalat to Creek. Route planner https://www.rta.ae/wps/portal/rta/ae/public-transport/journeyplanner Dubai Tram:The Dubai Tram links the Dubai Metro and the Palm Monorail, making it convenient for you to explore the restaurants and attractions in the JBR district and Palm Jumeirah.

item.title: Japan Tokyo-Osaka-Kyoto
item.description: Our offline app for Tokyo HERE Our offline app for Tokyo HERE Things you need to know before going to Japan for a smooth go “Fast Track”(for quarantine) and Visit Japan web service (for immigration and customs declaration) Visit Japan Web: https://vjw-lp.digital.go.jp/en/ Visit Japan Web is a web service that people entering to Japan（and Japanese returning to Japan）can use for Quarantine, Immigration and Customs procedures in order to enter/return to Japan.

item.title: Taipei
item.description: Our offline app for Taipei HERE How to Get Around by Public Transportation Type of transportation: MRT, LRT, Bus, Taxi, Uber, Bike Type of MRT tickets: Admission to the trains is via blue plastic single-journey tokens or electronic stored value cards called EasyCards. Travelers can calculate single journey fare here, which depends on journey distance. Single Journey: NT$20 - NT$65 One-day EasyCards Pass: NT$150 24hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$180 48hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$280 72hr Taipei Metro Pass: NT$380 All Pass Ticket: NT$1,280 includes unlimited rides for 30 days on Taipei Metro, Taipei buses, and YouBike bike share.
